comments.author: Matt
comments.body: I'm going to make a copy of the note from Dave's doctor, white-out his name, and write mine in today. My case of wussitis is a side-effect of my very first sports injury! I'm going to use my Turf Toeâ„¢ as an excuse to head over to the Rec Center and lift weights instead of riding today. My magic eight-ball says "Signs Point to Yes" for good weather and a great ride tomorrow.
